subject: Re: Min-box vs. RS hack
author: rosemary_guiley
full_text:
No extensive work yet.  I did several long sessions with April & Allen
Slaughter (one with Mark Macy, too) at The Stanley Hotel in mid-Nov. 
-- that was the Mini's debut.  I ordered one & got the first one
available, which was delivered to me two weeks later on the Queen Mary
at another TAPS event.  The ship was bad for reception, but April & I
were able to go offsite to test it out.  Then I had a couple of days
of working with it in LA.  The box is now in transit back to MD where
I live.  So the answer is, I haven't been able to do a lot of
structured sessions yet.  Probably won't happen much before Jan., as I
am away now most of Dec.  I would like to coordinate some blinds or
double blinds with other people.

The FB, which I have had since June, has seen more work.

Rosemary
